## Calculator.coefFromRate() method

Get the multiplier of a rate

**Signature:**

```typescript
static coefFromRate(rate: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  rate | number | Rate value to apply |

**Returns:**

number


## Example

We want the multiplier of a VAT rate (20%)

```
// Prints "1.2":
console.log(Calculator.coefFromRate(20));
```
